synopsis.text: These three unlikely companions - a lion, a toucan, and a lizard - find themselves navigating the complexities of office life in Japan's capitalist society, far removed from their natural habitat in the savanna. In the anime "Africa no Salaryman," these wild animals take on human roles, showcasing their unique quirks and vulnerabilities while providing a humorous and insightful look into the everyday life of office workers. With episodes ranging from one to three minutes, this series offers a fresh perspective on familiar office scenarios and delves deeper into the lives of its protagonists, all captured in the popular mobile phone portrait format.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
